perturbation.original_text: During the Term, Manufacturer shall self-insure or shall provide and maintain such insurance coverage, in minimum types and amounts as described below in this Section 11.
perturbation.changed_text: During the Term, Manufacturer shall maintain insurance coverage, in types and amounts as described below in this Section 11.
perturbation.explanation: Removing the 'self-insure' option along with the word minimum may introduce potential liability for Manufacturer.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Varies by jurisdiction - general insurance requirements for manufacturing companies.

perturbation.original_text: All insurance carriers shall have a minimum of “A-” A.M. Best rating.
perturbation.changed_text: Insurance carriers shall have an A.M. Best rating.
perturbation.explanation: The removal of 'minimum of' increases the potential risk and reduces the level of guarantee regarding the security of insurance coverage, and by extension, increases the legal risk.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Varies by jurisdiction - insurance solvency regulations and minimum rating requirements

perturbation.original_text: Automobile and Truck Liability Insurance: $2,000,000 combined single limit for bodily injury and property damage arising out of all owned, non- owned and hired vehicles, including coverage for all automotive and truck equipment used in the performance of this Agreement and including the loading and unloading of same.
perturbation.changed_text: Automobile and Truck Liability Insurance for bodily injury and property damage arising out of all owned, non- owned and hired vehicles, including coverage for all automotive and truck equipment used in the performance of this Agreement and including the loading and unloading of same.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the combined single limit it is not clear what limit the insurance covers for.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Varies by jurisdiction - automobile insurance liability limits
